Change my height: I would love to be taller because it would give me more confidence in social situations and allow me to reach higher shelves and places that are out of reach for someone my size. It would also make it easier for me to play certain sports or do activities like hiking.
Change my eye color: I would love to have green eyes because they are so unique and beautiful. They would also match my personality better, as I am known for being adventurous and curious.
Change my hair color: I would love to have blonde hair because it is so versatile and can be styled in many different ways. It would also complement my skin tone and make me look younger.

Change my body shape: I would love to have a more athletic build because it would give me more energy and allow me to participate in more physical activities. It would also make me feel more confident and self-assured.

Change my intelligence: I would love to be smarter because it would allow me to learn new things quickly and excel in my career. It would also make me more interesting to talk to and more respected by others.
